abstract: McNeil Consumer Healthcare, a unit of Johnson & Johnson, expanded a recall of Tylenol, Motrin and Benadryl, but did not follow a customary practice.
snippet: McNeil Consumer Healthcare, a unit of Johnson & Johnson, expanded a recall of Tylenol, Motrin and Benadryl, but did not follow a customary practice.
lead_paragraph: When Procter & Gamble announced a recent recall of some Scope mouthwash with defective child-resistant caps, it disclosed the extent of the recall  35,000 bottles  in a government news release.

headline.main: Pill Maker Declines to Specify Size of a Recall
headline.print_headline: Pill Maker Declines to Specify Size of a Recall
